spell_tooltip.description:
An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15%, and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Your auto attacks generate 20% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage, and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 63,550 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 26,080 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 31,683 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning for 2 sec.
Rampage has a 20% chance to immediately refund 10% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec, and Heroic Leap now also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Blasts all enemies within 12 yards for 248,548 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 40% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 8 Rage.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you, and reduce magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 21,667 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Thunder Clap's radius is increased by 50%, and it reduces movement speed by an additional 20%.
Bloodthirst deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Slam, Thunder Clap, and Whirlwind deal 20% more damage and 10% increased critical strike damage.
Increases the maximum number of charges on Charge by 1, and reduces its cooldown by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind or Thunder Clap hits 3 or more enemies, it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While dual wielding your damage is increased by 12% and movement speed is increased by 8%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 275,395 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 446,409 physical damage over 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
Activating Avatar or Recklessness grants 8 sec of the other.

Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 532,045 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Generates 10 Rage.

A mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 440,626 Physical damage.

Raging Blow has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.

Generates 14 Rage.
Enrage increases the damage your abilities deal by an additional 15% and Enrage's duration is increased by 1 sec.
Reduces damage taken by 30%, and Bloodthirst restores an additional 20% health. Usable while stunned or incapacitated. Lasts 8 sec.
Execute no longer costs Rage and now generates 20 Rage.
Bloodthirst damage increased by 10%.
You take 10% reduced damage while Enrage is active.
While Enraged, Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage.
While Enraged, your auto-attacks can no longer miss.
Enrages you and unleashes a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 702,025 Physical damage.
Raging Blow has 2 charges and has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Bloodthirst critical strikes generate 4 additional Rage, and inflict a Gushing Wound that leeches 133,172 health over 6 sec.
Bloodthirst deals 100% increased damage to enemies who are below 35% health.
Rampage increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 4 times. This effect is reset if you Rampage a different primary target.
Each Rampage strike has a 25% chance to refund a charge of Raging Blow.
Raging Blow causes every strike of your next Rampage to deal an additional 20% damage, stacking up to 5 times.

Whirlwind and Thunder Clap cause your next 4 single-target attacks to strike up to 4 additional targets for 55% damage.

Whirlwind generates 3 Rage, plus an additional 1 per target hit. Maximum 8 Rage.
Raging Blow increases the critical strike chance of your next Bloodthirst by 15% until it critically strikes, stacking up to 5 times.
Go berserk, increasing all Rage generation by 100% and granting your abilities 20% increased critical strike chance for 16 sec.
Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage and while Enraged, Raging Blow has a 10% increased chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Whirlwind and Thunder Clap deal 25% more damage and now affect your next 4 single-target melee attacks, instead of the next 2 attacks.
Mastery increased by 4% and if you are Enraged, Bloodthirst extends your Enrage by 2.0 sec.
Haste increased by 4% and Raging Blow and Bloodthirst generate an additional 4 Rage.

Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies, inflicting 774,353 Physical damage to all enemies over 9.2 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
Every 20 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Recklessness, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Bloodthirst at your target or random nearby enemy.
Recklessness lasts 4.0 sec longer.

Damaging enemies with Thunder Clap, Raging Blow, or Execute has a 25% chance to also strike one with a lightning bolt, dealing 231,232 Nature damage and generating 3 Rage.

Lightning Strikes occur 30% more often during Avatar.

Stormstrike or Nature damage your abilities deal is increased by 5%. Stormstrike damage ignores Armor.

Thunder Clap damage increased by 40%, and it generates 8 Rage. 

Seismic Reverberations, Improved Whirlwind, Meat Cleaver, and Barbaric Training now affect Thunder Clap in addition to Whirlwind.
Lightning Strikes also deal 51,560 to enemies near their target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Shield Slam damage increased by 15%.

Bloodthirst and Rampage damage increased by 25%.

Shield Slam and Bloodthirst have a 35% chance to grant you Thunder Blast, stacking up to 2 charges.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage and generates 10 Rage.
Storm Bolt also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning them for 2 sec, but its cooldown is increased by 10 sec.

talent.name: Keep Your Feet on the Ground

spell.name: Keep Your Feet on the Ground

spell_tooltip.description:
Physical damage taken reduced by 2%.

Thunder Blast reduces damage you take by 8% for 5 sec.
Thunder Blast calls down a Lightning Strike on an enemy it hits.

Lightning Strikes generate 3 Rage.

Raging Blow and Execute damage increased by 25%.
Lightning Strikes have a 15% chance to make your next 2 Bloodthirsts have no cooldown, deal 35% increased damage, and generate 2 additional Rage.

Casting Avatar grants you 2 charges of Thunder Blast and resets the cooldown of Thunder Clap.

While Avatar is not active, Lightning Strikes have a 10% chance to grant you Avatar for 4 secs.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage.

Mastery increased by 4% and if you are Enraged, Bloodthirst extends your Enrage by 2.0 sec.
Haste increased by 4% and Raging Blow and Bloodthirst generate an additional 4 Rage.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 950,092 Physical damage over 3.1 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.

Generates 10 Rage each time you deal damage.
Every 20 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Recklessness, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Bloodthirst at your target or random nearby enemy.
Recklessness lasts 4.0 sec longer.

Every 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by 1% for 20 sec, max 10 stacks.

Charge grants you 70% movement speed for 3 sec.

Charge removes all movement impairing effects, this effect cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Your next Rampage after Bladestorm ends deals 50% additional damage.
Bloodthirst critical strikes increase the damage of your next Bloodthirst by 20%.
Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by 15%.
Bloodthirst has a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 314,122 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Raging Blow damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can now use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15%, and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Movement speed increased by 5%.
Leech increased by 3%.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 25,333 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 31,496 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning for 2 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

While you are below 35% health, restores 1.0% health every 1 sec. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec, and Heroic Leap now also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.00% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.

Blasts all enemies within 12 yards for 242,550 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 40% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 8 Rage.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you, and reduce magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 22,231 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Thunder Clap's radius is increased by 50%, and it reduces movement speed by an additional 20%.
Cooldown of Enraged Regeneration, Pummel, Intervene, Spell Reflection, and Storm Bolt reduced by 5%.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Shockwave's range increased by 6 yards and when Shockwave strikes at least 3 targets, its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Stamina increased by 10% and Armor increased by 10%.
Increases the maximum number of charges on Charge by 1, and reduces its cooldown by 3 sec.
While wielding one-handed weapons your damage is increased by 3% and Leech increased by 2%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.

Throw a spear at the target location, dealing 259,230 Physical damage instantly and an additional 310,006 damage over 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Enemies hit are chained to the spear's location for the duration.

Generates 10 Rage.
Activating Avatar or Shield Wall grants 4 sec of the other.

Fight through the pain, ignoring 50% of damage taken until 654,347 damage has been prevented.

Repeated uses of Ignore Pain accumulate, up to 3 million total damage prevented.

Swing in a wide arc, dealing 90,234 Physical damage to all enemies in front of you. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Your successful dodges and parries have a chance to make your next Revenge cost no Rage.
Demoralizes all enemies within 10 yards, reducing the damage they deal to you by 25% for 8 sec.
Your auto attacks deal an additional 47,305 Physical damage and have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Increases maximum health by 30% for 15 sec, and instantly heals you for that amount.
Defensive Stance additionally reduces magic damage you take by 6%.
Devastate, Thunder Clap, Revenge, and Execute have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Last Stand increases your Rage generation by 50%.
Taunts all enemies within 10 yds to attack you for 6 sec.

Wounds the target, causing 42,685 Physical damage instantly and an additional 149,979 Bleed damage over 15 sec.

Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
10% of damage you deal adds to your active Ignore Pain.
Taunts all enemies within 14 yds to attack you for 6 sec, interrupts all spellcasting within 14 yds and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 6 sec.
Reduces all damage you take by 40% for 8 sec.
Last Stand's cooldown is reduced by 60 sec, and it grants you the Shield Block effect for its duration.

Blocking an attack deals 33,718 Physical damage to the attacker, ignoring armor. 

Generates high threat.
Shield Slam generates 2 more Rage and extends the duration of Shield Block by 1.0 sec.
Shield Block lasts 2 sec longer.
Every 20 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Recklessness, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Shield Slam reduces the remaining cooldown of Shield Wall by 6 sec.
Shield Slam deals 10% increased damage, and reduces enemies' damage against you by 3% for 9 sec. Multiple punishments may overlap.
Increases Strength and Armor by 5% and your critical strike chance by 1%.
Increases Block chance by 12% and your Block value by 24%.
Increases Stamina and Armor by 8% and your Haste by 2%.

Charge to an enemy with your shield, dealing 464,285 Physical damage to it and 147,092 Physical damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

Also stuns the primary target for 4 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Your maximum health is increased by 6%, and every 20 Rage you spend heals you for 1% of your maximum health.

Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies, inflicting 797,588 Physical damage to all enemies over 9.2 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
Shield Charge deals 20% increased damage, grants you Shield Block, and makes your next Revenge cost no Rage.

When your health is brought below 30%, you take 80% less damage for 8 sec and healing you receive is increased by 100%.

Cannot occur more than once every 3 min.
Bladestorm and Ravager's damage are reduced by 30% but they now have 2 charges and generate 10 additional Rage each time they deal damage.
Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by 10% and the amount of damage blocked by your critical blocks is increased by 20%.

Colossal Might increases damage dealt by your next Demolish by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.

Shield Slam grants a stack of Colossal Might and Revenge grants a stack of Colossal Might when it strikes 3 or more targets.
Shockwave also knocks enemies into the air, and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Shockwave, Revenge, and Whirlwind deal 5% more damage per target affected up to 5.
Colossal Might increases the damage of your Revenge by 7% per stack.
Damage prevented by each use of Ignore Pain is increased by 20%.
Shield Slam and Revenge damage increased by 10%.
Shield Slam critical strikes grant an additional stack of Colossal Might.

You deal 5% more damage and take 5.0% less damage.

Size increased by 5%.

Colossal Might now stacks up to 10 times. If you would gain a stack of Colossal Might and are at max stacks, the cooldown of Demolish is reduced by 2 sec.

Enemies affected by Demolish take up to 10% more damage from you and deal up to 10% less damage to you for 10 sec based on the number of stacks of Colossal Might consumed by Demolish.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15%, and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15%, and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Movement speed increased by 5%.

Your auto attacks generate 20% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage, and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 64,463 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 25,780 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 31,048 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning for 2 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

While you are below 35% health, restores 1.0% health every 1 sec. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Rampage has a 20% chance to immediately refund 10% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec, and Heroic Leap now also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Blasts all enemies within 12 yards for 245,605 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 40% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 8 Rage.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you, and reduce magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 21,870 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Cooldown of Enraged Regeneration, Pummel, Intervene, Spell Reflection, and Storm Bolt reduced by 5%.
Bloodthirst deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Stamina increased by 10% and Armor increased by 10%.
Slam, Thunder Clap, and Whirlwind deal 20% more damage and 10% increased critical strike damage.
Increases the maximum number of charges on Charge by 1, and reduces its cooldown by 3 sec.
A vicious strike that deals 629,468 Physical damage and reduces the effectiveness of healing on the target by 50% for 10 sec.
Overpower the enemy, dealing 318,001 Physical damage. Cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.
Overpower increases the damage of your next Mortal Strike or Cleave by 15%, stacking up to 2 times.
Increases your parry chance by 100% and reduces all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Execute no longer has a cooldown and if your foe survives, 10% of the Rage spent is refunded.
Overpower has 2 charges and deals 15% more damage.
You are healed for 85% of the damage dealt by Deep Wounds.
Your attacks have a chance to make your next Execute cost no Rage, be usable on any target regardless of their health, and deal damage as if you spent 40 Rage.
You have a 1.00% chance per Rage spent on attacks to reset the remaining cooldown on Overpower.
Smashes the enemy's armor, dealing 340,702 Physical damage, and increasing damage you deal to them by 30% for 10 sec.
Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by 10%.

Wounds the target, causing 136,271 Physical damage instantly and an additional 271,473 Bleed damage over 15 sec.

Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Every 20 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Recklessness, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Mortal Strike and Cleave have a 20% chance to instantly reset their own cooldowns.
Sweeping Strikes lasts 6 sec longer.
Strikes all enemies in front of you for 238,891 Physical damage, inflicting Deep Wounds. Cleave will consume your Overpower effect to deal increased damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Overpower deals 15% additional damage, has 10% increased critical strike chance, and deals 10% increased critical strike damage.
Colossus Smash increases your Haste by 10%, or by 20% if the target is below 35% health. Lasts for the duration of Colossus Smash.
Smash the ground and shatter the armor of all enemies within 10 yds, dealing 336,469 Physical damage and increasing damage you deal to them by 30% for 10 sec.
Execute is now usable on targets below 35% health.
Mastery increased by 2% and Tactician's chance to trigger is increased by an additional 1.0%.
Increases Versatility by 2% and reduces the cooldown of Die by the Sword by 30.0 sec.
Critical Strike chance increased by 2% and Execute immediately refunds 20% of the Rage spent.

Deep Wounds, Rend and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effects last 6.0 sec longer and have a 5% increased critical strike chance.

If you have Rend, Mortal Strike inflicts Rend on targets below 35% health.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 960,318 Physical damage over 3.1 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.

Generates 10 Rage each time you deal damage.
Your Mortal Strike, Cleave and Execute critical strike damage is increased by 10% and your Execute has a 5% increased critical hit chance.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Bloodthirst at your target or random nearby enemy.
Execute causes the target to take 35% more damage from your next Mortal Strike, stacking up to 2 times.
